post:
***UPDATE***
**********************************************************
ALL VMs Have Been Provisioned! Thanks for the interest!
**********************************************************

Hello,

I've set up an OpenVZ node with SolusVM for some personal dev, and have some spare resources that I would like to offer a couple of non-idle users.

I can offer the following

'4 CPU Cores (Intel Xeon L5520 x 2)
1-8GB of RAM
10GB SSD HD Space
1TB of Transfer at 100Mbit (Soft Cap)'
Location: Atlanta

Please PM me if you'd like one of these. I will not over allocate resources. This is not a business. This is a personal server that I am looking to host other devs / gamers on.
